content.detailedDescription: On tuesday june 7, 2005 at 9;45 p.M. i was on the patio at a neighbors house. we were out in the backyard grilling barbecue ribs, barbecue chicken, and steaks on the outdoor grills out in the backyard. i looked up and saw 2 circle ufos the first ufo was round and it had red, yellow, and pink lights and then it was a tamale red then it was a thousand island green. the second ufo on the inside of the bottom had red, yellow, and green lights then red, yellow, and purple lights. the triangler ufo was red lighted with white lights at every corner then we lost sight of the objects there was a whistling sound to all these objects it was clear outside the ufos probally crashed out into the ocean.
content.summary: I went ice skating and i went to a friends house to hangout.

content.detailedDescription: Hauling trash out from my farm, was at intersection of pearl lane, allen rd., and marvin rd.I looked that direction.What i typed to start with.Rectangle at least 20 ft.Wide or thick, and 100 ft. long, hull dark, had 6 orange lights evenly spaced along horizontal middle  and one orange light at each end.  radio field from it caused fear effect on me. ball-shape 10 ft. thick , bright-white lighted aircraft, camera-carrier?, was being used by the rectangle aircraft to watch the road leading toward hwy. 115
content.summary: Rectangle shape at least 20 ft. wide by 100 ft. long hovered about 100 ft. above ground along allen rd.      exact location  lat. 36degrees, 4 minutes  by 91degrees, 22 minutes, 30 seconds, on map.  about one fourth mile away from me to the southeast, its

content.detailedDescription: It came twards me in the water on the sea of cortez when i was picking up shells, i snapped pics of it travelin in the water, then it took up out of the water and followed a bird 50-100 feet from me i think it was watching me
content.summary: Rode in water like fish on bobber then took off in air

content.detailedDescription: This is a second hand report so i don't have a lot of details. on saturday dec. 3 i was talking to my neighbor who retired from the air force a few years ago with 24 years of service. at that time he was the person in charge of maintaining the planes. i started to tell him about what i had saw back in aug. when he stopped me and said he had heard this story before. he told me about a friend of his that had worked under him before he retired. this person is still active and does not want anyone to know who he is which is why i am making this report. my neighbor had his friend call me so that he could tell me what had happened. after talking on the phone for a few moments he asked if i had time to meet with him so he could tell me face to face.  i met with him yesturday sunday dec. 4. he said that he was in his yard taking pictures of his daughters birthday party when one of the kids noticed these two lights coming towards them and pointed them out to him. the kid asked what kind of planes they were. when he looked up at them he frist thought that the one in the front was a police helo with its search light on. then he relized that there was no beam coming from it. as they got closer he could see that the first one was not any type of aircraft that he knew of. he started to take some pictures of it when it suddenly shot up and out of sight. he did get two pictures of it just as it turned. after that he watch the second light coming towards him and it turned west towards the air force base. when it did he could see it was an a-10. the next day he spoke to the pilots that had been on duty and said he spoke to the one that was flying the a-10. a couple of hours later they were called to the base commanders office. when they got there they were told not to talk about this with anyone. they were told, in short, that doing so would be a very bad carrier move. he then gave me the two pictures that he took and said do whats right but don't give anyone my name. i agreed and he left. i have the two pictures if you tell me where i will mail them to you.
content.summary: A bright white light being followed by an a-10

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front deck talking to my neighbor when i noticed a bright light in the sky. i first thought it was some sort of flare used in emergency situations,thats what caught my attention. the one light branched off into three more,one by one and then after a minute or two went out one by one. after a few seconds to a minute a saw two or three very,very fast streaks shoot across the night sky in different directions. ive seen airplanes and jets before moving across the night sky and whatever these things were,they werent man-made. they were  blindingly fast.
content.summary: Saw one light suddenly turn into four lights one by one and then one by one slowly go out--i then saw two or three very fast streaks go off in different direstions.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a rock which extended about 40 ft. out into the water on a branch of the stockton lake area. i had been fishing. what made me notice the object was strange, i just new there was something there and looked straight up at it. i thought that the object might have been a star at first. well the object was about 90 - 100 ft. above the tree line. i would guess that it must of been about 15 - 30 ft in dia. at first i was trying to descern what the thing was, thinking to myself (stars are not yellow and its to big to be one) what happened next was what really scared me because another orb slightly smaller came from up and behind the other one and gave it a slight bumping.
 it came frome above and slightly from the south, and bumped it into the east from the west where the orange yellow (bigger one) went rolling across the sky not unlike that of a pool ball on a table after only a few feet it began to descend behind us into the trees. the blue white orb went streaking off up and towardsthe south west at an alarming speed i had time to count to 7 and it was a speck that blended in with the stars. it had a curved flight path leaving and elongated upside down u or arc. this all took place in about 2 to 3 min and after that i got out of there in a hurry.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I  saw a yellow orange ball of light when, another slightly smaller whitish blue orb came from just above the other and bumbed into it and then flew off at a very high rate.

content.detailedDescription: Was on an outing in sabino canyon; we had reached the end of the trail and had stopped to check things out before we headed back. i took this picture looking back the way we had just come. i did not see/notice these objects before, during, or after taking this picture. in november 2005, i was showing my pictures from the trip to a friend; he noticed the objects, and asked me what they were. i thought they were just birds or something, but when i zoomed in on them...Well...You can see what i saw. none of the other pics i took showed these objects. unfortunately, i didn't have my digital camera set to "fine", and as a result, i am not able to enhance these pics as much as i would like to better identify them. am really curious as to what these are...If you can identify them, let me know!
content.summary: Unknown objects at sabino canyon, mid-april 2004, mid-afternoon

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 8:20-30 pm dark outside i was out on my back porch smoking a cig and up in the sky over the hills in dilliner pa i saw a realy big greenish falling thing that looked like a fireball it was realy big and it was falling extremly fast, and looked as it hit some place out there. it looked really close. i could not see where it hit

i don't know what it was. i do believe it was nothing natural i have never seen anything like it before.

i didn't know if i should report it if people would think i was crazy so i didn't and i also didn't know where to report it and i just found this site today.
content.summary: Big green faling fireball thing

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading out of my house at approx. 5:45 pm. i have a very clean view of the night sky as i live very near to the ocean. i immediately noticed a very bright"star" like object just staying perfectly still in the air. i questioned it being an actual star as the size was so large andd bright compared to any other stars in the sky. 
this object had the attention of other aircraft in the sky. there were small aircraft flying around it, above it flying up to it and away from it. there were about 4 in all. there was one aircraft that my guess would be it was some sort of military plane. small in size and quite fast that had only 3 red colored lights (that i could see) and was shining a light at this object. (the light was like a very bright spotlight -like the ones in ny that shine up to the sky from the wtc site)this aircraft flew to and then away from the object heading south while still having it's light shining from the rear. (this struck me as odd and i noted it as a way to possibly identify what type of aircraft it was.) 
as far as the altitude, i would guess about 20,000 feet or more. it was hard to say. and it was definitely over the atlantic ocean somewhere between staten island and new jersey. 
i took about 4-5 photos with a plain film camera. some of the aircraft with the red lights and also of the object. 
at about 5;55 pm, i got in my vehicle and drove toward the water, the moon was very low in the horizon, in fact it was eerie. i have never seen anything like it. i think it looked like a lunar eclipse, however, i have never actually seen one before. i could see the whole moon, a halo around it, and the crescent was a light brown color. strange. the object, from my perspective, was hovering right above it. 
this was also witnessed by my husband and one of my children.
content.summary: Bright, stationary object seen in sky. other aircraft flying around it, shining light at it.

content.detailedDescription: Going to have thansgiving i have benn seeing it for a long time for about 3 months
content.summary: Flasing lights circle

content.detailedDescription: I and my spouse were driving home from sacramento,ca. to our home in walnut grove,ca.We were talking about her work and how her day and night went.I was driving our car and my spouse was sitting on the passinger side,we were just past the elk grove blvd exit,going south toward the twin cities exit that we take to get home.Suddenly terri my spouse said to me, geez look at those lights in the sky,they were off to my left and quite large,then she said they seem to be flying in some sort of formation,at this point i made an effort to look but only at intervials because it was hard to drive and look.The size and brightness was what first made her notice them. not long after she saw the lights we realized that they were extreamly larger than anything else in the sky,including stars.  other aircraft were visiable off in the distance and these lights were huge in comparison to them,and didn't really look like conventional passinger airplanes. then we realized that these lighs were in some sort of formation,at that point terri said maybe they are military,going to travis airforce base.But as she kept looking it became obvious that what ever these lights were they were not ordinary airplanes. she finally said they are in the form of a triangle,how strange,at that point we realized that the distance between these lights covered a huge area they were much further apart then we realized. we saw no blue,red or any other kinds of blinking lighs on them as on the aircraft we normally see all the time at night.This object covered a huge area of the night sky,they it didn't seem to be moving and we thought it was hovering,and if it was moving it was at a what seemed to be a very slow speed. what caught our attention next was the fact that there were no stars visable in the triangle itself,the reason for this observation was that the rest of the sky was literally filled with stars,it was a very clear nite no clouds of any sort u could see for miles without any trouble what so ever. we really were not alarmed because we had seen many strange objects in the sky when we lived in sonoma ca. a number of years before,in fact we would sit outside in lawn chairs with several of our friends and talk,so we did think it was strange but we really were not alarmed at that time. but terri continued to watch it until we were on twin cities rd , she would have had to turn clear around to keep looking at this triangle,and it was hard to do in our car.So we started to joke about it and terri said i don't really need any aliens in my life at this time ,and i laughed and said well we will stay off of their turff and they can stay off of ours. we continued to drive toward home and ever now and again she would look to see where this thing was ,at some point she either quit looking or she couldn't see it we really arn't sure which it was. then when we arrived home,we told our oldest daugher (she and her 11 yr old daugher live with us)about the this thing we had seen .Our daughter kind of stopped in her tracks because shortly before we arrive home our 11 yr old grand daugher and one of her friends who lives a  couple of houses down from us, came and told her about the u.F.O.They had seen shortly before and they said it freaked them out(their exact words)to the point that they ran into her house and were scared to go out to look at it again, our daugher kind of sluffed it off ,thinking they had just seen stars or airplans and were stretching the story as kids that age sometimes do. they told her it was in the shape of a huge traingle and didn't make any noise ,they said it was moving but not really fast and not really slow (again their words).But they didn't try to look for it again because it scared them. so when she said to us oh my god that is what whitney and her friend just had told her a short time before all three of us kind of stopped and thought ,now just what was it we saw? we talked about it for a little while and told her all that we had seen, we just kind of looked at each other and said well maybe it was a u.F.O. i had seen what i thought was a u.F.O. when we lived in sonoma but they were different .I had seen a huge white light suddenly appear over some rather large mountins (it was in the shape of a triangle but the size of it was absolutly mind boggling to me and it disappered as fast as it appered like when u turn on a light switch an the lights are on then u flip the switch and they are off)it was only visabel to me for a min.And maybe not that long it was really quick.Terri and i talked a little more about it but she was exausted and wanted to go to bed .I ended up staying up all night playing on my computer and talking to friends about this,but i wasn't scared or anything like that just really courious.I had been fascinated with the subject for years but when we moved from sacramento i kind of became kind of complacent about the subject.But after i started to really think about our experience,i thought you know maybe we should tell someone about this and see if there were any others that seen this thing, hence this monologe (sorry i seem to be going  on and on  about it)and our decision to report this incident. thank you for having this place on the internet where i could report it. i have also called a man who belongs to mufon and lives in truckee,ca.I left a message on his answering machine ,left him a short rundown of this sighting, and hope he will return my call at some point . but i thought maybe it would be a good idea to report it to you also. thank you for your time. my name is mary-aileen logan and my partner is terri logan.Hope you can maybe give us an idea what this is all about . again thank you ,mary-aileen logan
content.summary: 3 large bright lites shape of triangle large stars not seen inside clear nite many stars could be seen except inside opject

content.detailedDescription: 5:30 am i was coming home from work (i work at the post office late shift.)  driving from west to east on new circle road when i noticed a series of lights over the mall area on nicholasville road.  the thing that caught my eye was that the lights were stationary and not moving much.  at this point it looked like a single line of white lights.  i would estimate the pattern to be the size of a concord jet (i have see one of those before flying kind of low in europe at a special air show, so i know how big they look.)  i was driving toward the object when it did something that really caught my attention.  it made a right angle turn in the sky.  it did not make a slow turn like a plane but a rotating right angle turn. when it turned like that i could see that it was "v" shaped.  i have seen the tv show where all of these people saw a "v" shaped object and it looked just like that.  after that, it headed north at a very high rate of speed.
content.summary: Series of lights over lexington , ky dec 01-2005

content.detailedDescription:
Horrifying things happened after that. my whole family is mentally ill or just flat evil now. a christian radio minister murded his wife with his car and the highway patrolmans wife was slleping with everyone elses husband in the neighborhood. that street was saratoga in redding, ca. it was one of the richest neighborhoods in the city, can you tell me more about the craft in your picture.  my middle daughter and i saw it when we sitting in our pool. we balnked out the event for a few months. there was also a low flying fireball that i saw with neighbors at a barbecue. i really would like to have some help with healing from this event and if there is any hope for the rest of my family.  we were a very stable family of 5 before that.
terrie
content.summary: A gold ship like the one in your classifed ad was over our house and hovered almost still 20' above the house

content.detailedDescription: My mom is a garden nut (roses she loves roses)and i went out there and we were talking and my mom is a very religious woman she never drinks,smokes,cusses,or anything.She always have said that there is no such thing its all hogwash...Well i dont know why but i looked up and flying above our house was a silver kinda shaped like a cigar but a little differnt.I pointed it out and my mom saw it.I said mom thats a u.F.O. she said no it cant be its a plane i said mom if it was a plane then we would hear the engines it was totaly silent.She just stood there mouth dropped open just watching it it fly over and was gone..I know it was no plane or a wheather ballon it was way to big..
content.summary: Just a fly by

content.detailedDescription: On august 24, 2005, i was going to the market in malibu. i was just getting into my car, when something in the sky sparkled. looking up, i clearly saw in a near-cloudless sky, what appeared to be a huge shiny metallic ball hovering a thousand feet over the santa monica mountains, approx. 4 miles distance. it didn't move, drift, rise or fall, and being sure it wasn't a helicopter, i ran for my binoculars (10x30's). when i got back, it was still there. through the glasses, it resolved into a perfect sphere. then, to my amazement, a passenger jet (on its normal approach to lax) flew right at the object, banking hard to its left, and behind it, so i could see it in perfect relief. from my view, the object appeared to be 2/3 the height of the jet's fuselage, making it about 20' in diameter. the object began to slowly rise straight up, taking about a minute to disappear. i went to the store, met someone else who'd seen it, and after marketing, looked up to see four military jets streaking back and forth in the sky where the object had been. nice confirmation.
content.summary: Shining ball in skies over santa monica mountains in malibu

content.detailedDescription: An employee of mine claimed that as she was driving along the road that bisects the seal beach naval weapons station, he car , and several around her, lost power and could not be restarted for several minutes.  she also claims she headr from others that there were "lights in the sky" over the long beach/seal beach area.
content.summary: Power outage near seal beach naval weapons station, lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a family birthday gathering and just happened to look up at the sky.There were no clouds so my vision was not restricted.As i looked up i saw the triangle heading s/sw along the frontrange.It was moving very slowly.Its size was approx.250-300ft. long and 100 ft. wide.The object turned west (towards pikes peak)and slowly disappeared fom sight.The most intriguing aspect of this object was its ability to blend in with the night sky.It was if you could see through the object and see the stars but you could still see that this was a solid object from its outline.
content.summary: Black triangle spotted flying along front range.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling home from work at 9:30 pm traveling west on us 80.  i was just west of scott, ga. when i noticed an orange colored star that seemed unusually bright.  it did not blink like an airplane and there were no other colored lights.  i watched it for a while and it seemed to move laterally a bit, which i dismissed as my movement around curves at first.  i began to mark the star in relationship to the trees that lined both sides of the road.  the object clearly was moving laterally as well as vertically.  i observed the movement for about a minute or so.  the object suddenly moved to the north and went completely out of sight very quickly.  i looked for it for another 20 minutes and never saw it again.
content.summary: Bright orange star which moved vertically and horizontally.

content.detailedDescription: My self and a longtime friend were travelling east on highway 32e about 12-15 miles outside ashdown, ar. i was driving, when i noticed an aircraft flying fairly low, to the east n-e. i though at the time time it seemed to be flying kinda slow but didn't pay to much attention to it. we travelled a few miles further down the highway, when we turned south on l.R. 33. about 1 mile down this road the aircraft became visible, after having lost sight due to trees. at this point, neither me or my friend have said anything about it. this particular road is  approximately 3 miles long. the whole time we're both watching this "plane". i'm becoming increasingly worried about the "unnatural" speed of the craft at this point. it moved similar to the speed of an ultra-lite glider. keep in mind that we are in thick woods, dirt roads (for the most part), "deer country" as we call it. after travelling to the end of l.R. 33 we turned left onto red bluff road, at which point, we lost site of the craft due to trees. we travelled approximately 2-3 miles and turned right onto l.R. 31. it was at this point that we could see the object much closer. this was also the point in which my fried turned to me and asked "what the f--- is that!?" we continued to head south on l.R. 33 watching this thing when trees would allow an unobstructed view, which was quite often. the road is windy and at one point it pretty much straightens out. from this vantage point we could see the craft well. it had lights on it sort of like a plane, but they didn't look like a planes lights. the bulbs i mean. it was shortly after watching for some seconds and coming to the realization that this thing could not stay aloft in the air at this rate of speed, i told my friend "some thing's shouldn't be messed with", and turned around in one of the few driveways. as i started to drive back the way we came, i looked in my rearview mirror and seen the craft come out above the trees about 15-20 yards and stop above the road. giving in to my own curiosity, and my friends plea's, i turned and went back. about 1/4 mile from where i had turned around there is a bridge. we stopped on the bridge and turned my honda crx off, and rolled down the windows. the craft was still just sitting over the road. we listened but heard absolutely no sound whatsoever from this craft. my friend is an avid deer hunter and estmated the distance to be about 300 yards, straight in front. i would also add that this was a beatiful starry evening and a almost, if not full, moon (i remember the conditions distinctly). this was the first chance that we had to make out the lights. they flashed sequentially like an airplane would, but they were not "placed" in such a way. they would flash from right to left. blue, white, red. we couldn't make out the shape of the craft, but it must have been 30-50 feet long, if i had to guess. we watched it for about 2-2 1/2 minutes. the whole time the craft sat motionless, soundless. it started to bother me, because i started thinking that maybe the craft was coming toward us at the same incredibly slow speed it was travelling at and it just appeared to be sitting there. but the lights never got bigger, or smaller and never moved from side to side once it stopped. it appeared to just stop in mid-air for a prolonged period. i manuvered my honda back around, and we left. with it still sitting there, despite my friends objections. i just didn't feel comfortable driving any more near it. i can't speculate what it was in fact, but i do know that it is the only thing that i can honestly say just did not belong there. that's the best way i can describe it. this area also has a history unexplained craft. thanks for your time.
content.summary: My friend and i were travelling in my car when an unknown aircraft stopped

content.detailedDescription: I was in my dear stain.  it was just getting real good light.  i was facingnorth.  when what i thought was a meteor come from directly overhead at extremely high rate of speed and then about the position of 10 o'clock.  it stopped and hovered there was no fiery tale or anything.  just a blue teardrop shaped flame with a small dark spot on the leading edge it hovered for about three seconds and then just disappeared.!  i had no notion of what it was all reaction.  just curiosity,
content.summary: A teardrop blue flame with a small round or oval center

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south from jimmi carr rd. on chui chui to hanna rd the lights are a amber color and apeared in a triangle formation on a clear night they were stationary and low altitude then just vanished all at once i reconized these lights as i have seen them on varrious other occations and have reported this to you. these lights often appear, my mother has been witness to this as my brother has and his girl friend. these lights are most unusual not like regular fcc aircraft lights not strobe, or red or blue or bright white but amber and large not too bright; only ps craft are completley silent twice have i seen these lights move befor fading out they are most probably not flairs as they do not asend or desend but move horazontaly across the sky at a very low altitude about 8 oclock to the horizion  these lights should be investigated you will not be dissapointed! if you have any out here please chk it out all my sightings are consistant 3 or more large amber lights, same pattern ,these lights stand out from all other aircraft -no craft is visable carrying lights but i once saw them make about a 160 dgr. turn in wich a three light triangle went from a still position of about 20 mnts. to this turn all lights moved in unison as if connected then flew due south as far as my vew was not obstructed all on a paralel plane and moved  very slow this was at about the 7oclock vew of the horrizion and probably no more than a couple of miles due west of our back yard near the sighting tonight.Ie. from the spacing of the lights that moved this craft seemd to be at least the size of a football field no smaller i am a landscape artist and am a very good judge o0f distance from most vews in my area i also had many points of reffence even though it is mostly very rural and dark at night as ther are freeway lights and powerplant lights and various housing developments scatterd about and small mountians powerlines and a small airport about 20 miles due north of here wich disperce many small aircraft inwich i can obtain a visual relationship of flying craft i cannot give an altitude but only the relationship between the lights and the normal aircraft that is seen regularly,ie.Cropdusters, fixedwing highaltitude,helo.Ether comercial but mostly border patrol wich none of look anything like these large amber lights. these lights appear so often that i have only reported them twice as a collective. but have seen them on at least 6 diffirent occasions.Mostly because on those times i looked or at least was trying to be aware if any should appear i probably will not report the next sight unless it is remarcable in some way all of my sightings that i have seen are not aircraft that iam acustomed to seeing and do not have proper lighting no strobr not red not blue nor bright white nor do thes lights remain lit for a very long period of time always appearing on low cloud or no cloud nights or atleast below cloud cover wich always seems to be low altitudeif i recieve no responce from you i will no longer trouble you as i will assume that this is somthing you are allready aware of. i will just have to marvel at them and wonder ?
content.summary: 3 amber lights low altitute south west of casa grande  no more than 5 or 6 miles out of town

content.detailedDescription: I was coming into town and saw a huge cone ufo. it was red on the top and yellow on the bottom it then changed to red on the topand purple on the bottom. then it disappeard and i saw some red pecular light above me. this happened on june 7, 2005 on a tuesday night at 9:45 p.M. there was no sound to the cone ufo. it was partly cloudy that night.
content.summary: I was coming through town and saw a huge cone ufo red pecular lights over russell kansas

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday evening while driving to maricopa az.  in the sky numerous yellowish lights blinking to no pattern. lined up one straight line.  after a few minutes the lights splitted up into 3 objects, they moved sideways quickly. all 3 stood still no sound they were under the airplanes that were flying higher up.  it was a clear night, cool and another car pulled to the side to watch also.  these 3 objects stayed in the sky for awhile until it looked like someone turned off a light switch the two of them disappeared.  one stayed for awhile then that one flickered and away it went.  we stayed on the side of the road and watched the sky and say further down from the last three a flicker of light the same light of a object reappearring in the sky.  same size, lights and stood still.  we tried calling our 4 cell phones had no reception showing very unusual.  so we drove off keeping a eye in the sky and as we drove the object stayed lite and thenn the other two appeared and flashed out once again.  this is a small farm area where this was happeneing no street lights, homes or traffice.  we had investigated the next day the newspaper and other things there ws no sightings of this one.  there was 5 people in the car all saw the same thing.
1. the 5 of us were going to harrtahs
2. the lights were bright and hugh and long
3. uncertian
6. object disappeared blinked out and reappeared futher down same vacinty.
content.summary: Seen 1 object splitted into 3 flickering lights, no sound reappearing same spot

content.detailedDescription:
While trying to figure out how to work my new digital camera, i captured unusual activity over todi, italy. ironically, i didn't realize i even had the ability to capture video at the time. 

i recently loaded the images onto my computer and noticed that i had a few movie files. that's when i spotted the unusual object flying up from the valley. 

i captured some frames of the movie and pulled the images into photoshop where i could zoom in.  one image in particular clarified that this was probably a craft. 

upon further study, i located other activity on the short film clip. i've also noticed that you can distinctly hear a sound associated with the object.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo activity over todi, italy accidently captured in video on digital camera

content.detailedDescription:
Walking home to my home after leaving the car of a friend noticed a search light moving arount the high fields of the farmland a little i was annoyed at the possibility of illegal deer hunters in the area who have been known to use lamps mounted on four wheel drives to blind the deer and then shoot them later i noticed that this was not a jeep because the sky was clearly visible beneath it and the hills well its probably the army who have a base nearby on a training with a helicopter i thaught 
then while i continued walking this fat triangle passed through the air above the field to my right the first thing that seemed strange was the speed which was not fast and apparently de celerating i had a good look at it as it passed and noted the corrugated lines a brown colour and the triangular or rounded triangular shape then it continued on to the east or north east towards north of dublin city! the sound was a hissing ang gurgle type sound that was not very loud but not unusual! semms like stealth or spy aircraft?
content.summary: Triangular shaped dark brown in colour  4/5  orange lights in line near or behind middle of underside and two very bright lights on front facing down to ground at approximately 35 digrees

content.detailedDescription: Driving my car on west side rd. in woodbury, i saw a large object slowing flying over the tree tops on the other side of town. at first i thought it was a big plane. i was concerned because it was so low, and it was huge. also it had several lights, mainly red and yellow in a curved shape. i felt they must go all the way around. i tried to get closer and drove onto school street, but it went behind a cloud and i didn't see it again. i got two good looks at it as it went slowly downward. i was afraid it might crash, but i didn't hear any noise. it looked like it was flying over mountain rd. or white deer rocks rd.Both about a mle from where i was driving.
content.summary: Large, circular, several lights encircling the center. it didn't make any noise.  hovering low and slowly moving.

content.detailedDescription:
Summer 1957, about 9:00pm my two brothers and myself were camping outside of our house, when we all saw three brilliant lights moving slowly from the sw to the ne.  there was total silence.  one of us went in  to get our parents, they came out and saw the lights as well.
the lights continued ne and disappeared beyond the  horizon.
none of us had any idea what the lights were, and we were trying to figure this out, when they appeared again, this time from the ne travelling sw.  at about a 90 degree elevation, the lights stopped moving and hovered for a short time.  again, there was total silence.
suddenly, the lights seemed to drop very fast and moved out at a high rate of speed moving sw, where they dropped from sight.  again, total silence.
as i recall, our reaction was mostly one of curiosity, and we were wondering what it was that we had just seen.
i still wonder what it was.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three brilliant lights, moving in complete silence across the night sky

content.detailedDescription: My ex-wife and i were watching leno, i walked outside for a cigerette, looked up @ the moon and witnessed the object approx. 300 ft. over my home, directly between the light of the moon and my view. i saw the object from the leading edge, the silouette, and the trailing edge. this was an evening of a leoonoid meteor shower, so i origannally went out to see if i could see any shooting stars.I knew what it was because of the distance between the object and the roof of my house. it moved extremely wierd like dipping in the front like it was falling off a cliff then instantly the back would dip just as quickly. the bottom surface was dimpled as though it had been struck by different sized meteors. it was like lookin at the surface of the moon. the dimples had plumes or splash marks. the only sound i heard was a light wind and it was from normal wind. i yelled inside to my wife @ the time and called her outside. she was really nervous and went in and locked me out on her way in. i knocked and asked her to come witness the object as it moved over our home and all the way down a 7 mile plain behind our old house. the object even though it was hard to focus on because of the vibrating but seemed to be moving at like 3-4 miles an hour extremely slow across the field but hard to focus on still. ifor the next few weeks i was actually just wierded out, i couldnt believe i had seen one so close up. i could even see that it had small round portals flush on its fusalage.The object seemed pearlglow from the bottom view and leading edge, it glowed like psydellic tera cata from the trailing edge, like it was boiling steel.It finally dipped behind some trees. this thing was like the size of ahouse, floating through the air. the wierdest thing ive ever seen. i still know exactly what i saw ,could not have been anything else. made the hair on my arms stand straight up.
content.summary: Oval sphere with different sized dimples on bottom surface, moon like craters. opal like surface.Trailing edge glowed tera cata orange. or like a hps parking lot bulb color. quivered as though it was vibrating extremely eratic

content.detailedDescription: West of carlton on flyingm rd. found while looking at photo.
content.summary: Found while looking thru photos

content.detailedDescription:
1) riding along in the car while my b/f was driving
2) i just was watching the sky, nothing abnormal as most activity is just planes as i was fairly close to the airport on 35e going south.

3) a plane
4) it was more of a glowing light, there was a subtle center to it, which kind of moved and transformed, but overall it was a very bright light that moved a long side of us on 35e, it changed directions as we did, through the exit of yankee doodle road, it turned left as well, but was way too low to be a plane.  it rested and stopped when we did as well at our house, i asked my b/f if he could see it, he said yes, must me a light on a tower near by or something because it wasn't moving, first he thought it was a plane, i didn't comment at first that it followed us home.
5) my reactions were some interest, actually just felt pretty peaceful during the entire time, not fearful at all.
felt content.  i do remember seeing another light out of the corner of my eye, but for whatever reason i chose not to focus on that one.  

6) it was outside for more then a half an hour as i would just walk to the window and check to see if it was still there, now i kind of wished i got binoculars to go outside to look a bit closer, though i felt no urgent rush to do so.  it was basically in the same spot for more then an half an hour.
6) eventually about 30-40 min later i went and checked and there wasn't any light in the trees any longer.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We were driving along 35e going south, there was quite a bit of air trafic, so i thought this was a plane, however it just captured my attention and i kept watching it, never breaking eye contact with it, it seemed to follow us home.
